member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Finance.PaymentPlanIneligibilityReason.PreventedBySystemConfiguration
member.summary: System configuration prevents the user from creating a payment plan
member.remarks: Reasons may include, but are not limited to: - Corrupted system files pertaining to configuration - User payment plan creation disabled - No default or rule-based payment plan requirements defined for a billing term - Corrupted payment plan template file(s) - Payment Plan template compatibility for payment plan creation (must be active, Auto Calculate Plan Amount = Yes, Modify Plan Automatically = Yes, Terms and Conditions document specified)

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Finance.PaymentPlanIneligibilityReason.ChargesAreNotEligible
member.summary: Payment items charges are not eligible for inclusion on a payment plan
member.remarks: Reasons may include, but are not limited to: - No payment items with a payable receivable type - Payment Plan template compatibility for payment plan creation (payment item amount >= Minimum Plan Amount, Allowed Receivable Types permits payment item's receivable type)

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Finance.RefundVoucherStatus.NotApproved
member.summary: NotApproved status means that approvals are required for vouchers, and that the voucher does not have sufficient approval signatures to make it outstanding.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Finance.RefundVoucherStatus.Outstanding
member.summary: Outstanding status means that the voucher amounts have been reflected in the general ledger.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Finance.RefundVoucherStatus.Paid
member.summary: Paid status means that the voucher has been paid.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Finance.RefundVoucherStatus.Reconciled
member.summary: Reconciled status means that the cash disbursement for the voucher has been reconciled with the bank.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Finance.RefundVoucherStatus.InProgress
member.summary: InProgress status means that the voucher is unfinished.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Finance.RefundVoucherStatus.Voided
member.summary: Voided status means that the voucher has been voided.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Finance.RefundVoucherStatus.Cancelled
member.summary: Cancelled status means that the voucher was cancelled.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Finance.RefundVoucherStatus.Unknown
member.summary: Unknown status.
